job.title: Software Engineer (Early Startup)
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtltugtOverviewltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtLooking for a Lead DeveloperSoftware Engineer to help build out our platform and grow our developer team This position comes with a lot of decision power responsibility and control over the technical aspects of our business Being an early hire and in charge of such a major part of the business applicants should expect to be treated as and act as a cofounder Applicants should not only be willing to work in a startup environment but thrive in one The best applicants will be able to wear many hats and will be a jack of all trades in modern tech development as we build and iterate with various technologies This position will report directly to the CEOltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgt1 Oversee develop and code the technical side of the SaidThat platformltpgtltpgt2 As the team scales Manage hire and build out SaidThats development teamltpgtltpgt3 Build iOS ampamp Android apps along with a corresponding websiteltpgtltpgt4 Help inform the company on the best technologies and practices to useltpgtltpgt5 Work with designeragency to implement their design flow and layout for the platformltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgt1 A bachelors degree or higher in computer scienceltpgtltpgt2 Proficient in Javascript CSS ampamp HTML Previous experience in Node React and React Native is a major plusltpgtltpgt3 Leadership experienceltpgtltpgt4 Previous experience developing smartphone applicationsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtCompensationltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtThe position will be paid at the most competitive salary we can offer given our initial funding Additionally applicants that are a good long term fit can also expect to be awarded equity in the company on a traditional vesting cycleltpgt
